title: Womens Dress

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater amazingly soft with a fuzzy material, and appreciate its adorable appearance, cozy feel, and great quality. They like its color and warmth, with one customer noting it's perfect for fall. The size receives mixed feedback - while some find it generously sized, others mention the sleeves are too long. The buttons receive criticism for being bad and loose.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Merry Christmas to me!
items.body: I LOVE this sweater, it is so soft and fits perfectly. Tried the medium, was too snug.The color is brighter than I expected but I love it also. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous!
items.body: I love this sweater it is so cute it can be dressed up or dressed casual with a pair of jeans, it's so soft and cozy it's well made the only thing that I can say that's not positive is the buttons are a little bit loose but for the price I can needle and thread them on a little more secure! I promise you if you get this as a gift for someone she will love it! I'm ordering two more in two different colors. Read more
items.author: Sally P

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the big busted girls
items.body: Love the sweater, but not the buttons. The buttons make the sweater look cheap. I will make a run to the fabric stores to search out new buttons so I can wear this sweater! I have a big bust with an hour glass figure and it seriously fits perfect and compliments my figure. I purchased a large and am a 36 F. The fabric is nice and soft, not itchy inside at all. Read more
items.author: Jessica Runnels

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh...
items.body: It's an ok sweater. Just ok. It's pretty much as pictured. I got the 'ivory' color which is actually more like 'oatmeal' (as shown). I got a medium (my usual size), but probably could have gotten a small - maybe depends on how you want it to fit. It seemed pretty wide to me. Its very soft, but at the same time you can feel it on. Not quite itchy, but you can feel it (not. sure how else to describe that) - if you're sensitive it might not work. If you're not sensitive, it would probably be ok. The buttons are pretty bad. On the ivory they're very obviously white plastic - they stand out and look cheap. If I were keeping the sweater I'd want to replace them. As I said, it's ok. If you need an oatmeal sweater, this might be the thing for you. Doesn't really boost my wardrobe, so it's going back. Read more
items.author: Lorri

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and sexy!
items.body: The color blue is to die for, and it’s so soft and sexy! True to size, well made, just a great sweater! Read more
items.author: Bootbaby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable
items.body: This sweater is amazing soft comfortable and you can wear it open or buttoned with one button off the shoulder. You can wear it alone or with something under it. The quality is amazing. I love the material. The only problem I had with it, but I fixed it was the buttons were a little bit loose Besides that awesome buy Read more
items.author: Sarah Lynn

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as nice as photo
items.body: Too big, very long sleeves. Buttons make this sweater look very cheap. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good one
items.body: I just love the fit and it washes well. This color is my favorite. Read more
items.author: Cathy maropoulos

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Khaki, Blue, Ivory, Celadon, Cuban Sand, Pebbles, Black, Caramel, Carnations, Wisteria, Glacial Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
